Verses: 1 ivaigalukkup Pinbu, Yesrayelanaagiya Naaboththukku Yesrayelile Samaariyaavin Raajaavaagiya Aagaabin Aramanai Andaiyil Oru Dhraatchaththottam Irundhadhu.

2 aagaab Naaboththode Pesi: Un Dhraatchaththottam En Veettirku Aduththirukkirapadiyaal, Adhaik Keeraikkollaiyaakkumpadi Enakkuk Kodu, Adhaippaarkkilum Nalla Dhraatchaththottaththai Adharkup Padhilaaga Unakkuth Tharuven; Alladhu Unakku Vendumaanaal, Adhin Vilaikkirayamaana Panaththaith Tharuven Endraan.
3 naabodh Aagaabai Nokki: Naan En Pidhaakkalin Sudhandharaththai Umakkuk Kodaadhapadi Karththar Ennaik Kaappaaraaga Endraan.

4 ippadi En Pidhaakkalin Sudhandharaththai Umakkuk Koden Endru Yesrayelanaagiya Naaboth Thannode Sonna Vaarththaikkaaga Aagaab Salippum Sinamumaai, Than Veettirku Vandhu, Pojanampannaamal, Than Kattilin Mel Paduththu, Than Mugaththaith Thiruppik Kondirundhaan.
5 appozhudhu Avan Manaiviyaagiya Yesabel Avanidaththil Vandhu: Neer Pojanampannaadhapadikku, Ummudaiya Manam Salippaayirukkiradhu Enna Endru Avanaik Kettadharku,

6 avan Avalaip Paarththu: Naan Yesrayelanaagiya Naaboththode Pesi: Un Dhraatchaththottaththai Enakku Vilaikkirayamaaikkodu; Alladhu Unakku Raasiyaanaal Adharkup Padhilaaga Vere Dhraatchaththottaththai Unakkuth Tharuven Endren. Adharku Avan: En Dhraatchaththottaththai Umakkuk Kodukkamaatten Endru Sonnaan Endraan.

7 appozhudhu Avan Manaiviyaagiya Yesabel Avanai Nokki: Neer Ippodhu Isravelinmel Raajyabaarampannugiravar Allavaa? Neer Ezhundhu Pojanam Panni Manamagizhchchiyaayirum; Yesrayelanaagiya Naaboththin Dhraatchaththottaththai Naan Umakkuk Koduppen Endru Sonnaal.

8 aval Aagaabin Peyaraal Nirubangalai Ezhudhi, Avan Muththiraiyai Avaigalukkup Pottu, Andha Nirubangalai Naabodh Irukkum Pattanaththil Avanode Kudiyirukkira Moopparidaththukkum Periyoridaththukkum Anuppinaal.
9 andha Nirubangalil Aval Ezhudhinadhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Ubavaasam Endru Prasiththappaduththi, Naaboththai Janaththin Mun Niruththi,

10 dhevanaiyum Raajaavaiyum Dhooshiththaai Endru Avanmel Saatchichollugira Peliyaalin Makkalaagiya Irandu Perai Avanukku Edhiraaga Niruththi, Avanai Veliye Kondupoi Avan Saagumpadikku Avanaik Kalleriyungal Endru Ezhudhinaal.
11 avan Pattanaththile Kudiyirukkira Moopparum Periyorumaagiya Avan Pattanaththu Manushar, Yesabel Thangalukku Anuppina Nirubangalil Ezhudhikkattalaiyittirundhapadiye Seydhaargal.
12 avargal Ubavaasam Endru Prasiththappaduththi Naaboththai Janaththin Munne Niruththinaargal.

13 appozhudhu Peliyaalin Makkalaagiya Irandu Per Vandhu, Avanukku Edhiraaga Utkaarndhu: Naaboth Dhevanaiyum Raajaavaiyum Dhooshiththaan Endru Janaththirku Munbaaga Avanmel Saatchi Sonnaargal; Adharkuppinbu Avanaip Pattanaththirku Veliye Kondu Poi, Avan Saagumpadikku Avanaik Kallerindhu,
14 pirpaadu Yesabelukku, Naabodh Kalleriyundu Seththaan Endru Solliyanuppinaargal.

15 naabodh Kalleriyundu Seththadhai Yesabel Kettapodhu, Aagaabai Nokki: Neer Ezhundhirundhu, Yesrayelanaagiya Naabodh Umakku Vilaikkirayamaaik Kodukkamaatten Endru Sonna Dhraatchaththottaththai Sondhamaai Eduththukkollum; Naabodh Uyirodillai, Avan Seththupponaan Endraal.
16 naabodh Seththupponadhai Aagaab Kettapodhu, Avan Yesrayelanaagiya Naaboththin Dhraatchaththottaththai Sondhamaai Eduththukkollumpadi Ezhundhuponaan.
17 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Thisbiyanaagiya Eliyaavukku Undaayitru, Avar:
18 nee Ezhundhu, Samaariyaavilirukkira Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Aagaabai Sandhikkumpadi Po; Idho, Avan Naaboththin Dhraatchaththottaththai Sondhamaai Eduththukkolla Ange Poyirukkiraan.

19 nee Avanaip Paarththu: Nee Kolai Seydhadhum Eduththukkondadhum Illaiyo Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naaigal Naaboththin Raththaththai Nakkina Sthalaththile Unnudaiya Raththaththaiyum Naaigal Nakkum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
20 appozhudhu Aagaab Eliyaavai Nokki: En Pagaignane, Ennaik Kandupidiththaayaa Endraan. Adharku Avan: Kandupidiththen; Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seyya Nee Unnai Vitruppottaai.
21 naan Unmel Pollaappu Varappanni, Un Sandhadhiyai Azhiththuppottu, Aagaabukku Suvaril Neervidum Oru Naayaagilum Iraadhapadikku Isravelil Adaipattavanaiyum Vidupattavanaiyum Sangariththu,

22 nee Enakkuk Kobam Undaakki, Isravelaip Paavancheyyappanninadhinimiththam, Unnudaiya Kudumbaththai Nebaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Yerobeyaamin Kudumbaththukkum, Agiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paashaavin Kudumbaththukkum Samaanamaakkuven Endraar Endru Sonnaan.
23 yesabelaiyum Kuriththuk Karththar: Naaigal Yesabelai Yesrayelin Madhil Aruge Thinnum.
24 aagaabin Sandhadhiyil Pattanaththile, Saagiravanai Naaigalum, Veliyile Saagiravanai Aagaayaththup Paravaigalum Thinnum Endraar.
25 than Manaiviyaagiya Yesabel Thoondivittapadiye, Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seyya, Thannai Vitruppotta Aagaabaippola Oruvanumillai.
26 karththar Isravel Puththirarukku Munnindru Thuraththivitta Emoriyar Seydhapadiyellaam, Avan Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaip Pinpatri, Magaa Aruvaruppaai Nadandhukondaan.
27 aagaab Indha Vaarththaigalaik Kettapodhu, Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththu, Than Sareeraththinmel Rattaipporththukkondu, Ubavaasampanni, Rattile Paduththuth Thaazhmaiyaai Nadandhukondaan.
28 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Thisbiyanaagiya Eliyaavukku Undaayitru, Avar:

29 aagaab Enakku Munbaagath Thannaith Thaazhththinadhaik Kandaayaa? Avan Enakku Munbaagath Thannaith Thaazhththugirapadiyinaal, Naan Avan Naatkalil Andhap Pollappai Varappannaamal, Avan Kumaaran Naatkalil Adhai Avan Veettinmel Varappannuven Endraar.
